record.title: SIBLINGS CONNECTION DAY

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Judiciary Committee be discharged from further consideration of S. Res. 86, and that the Senate proceed to its consideration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: The clerk will report the resolution by title.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating to the resolution be printed in the Record, with no intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
